languages.text: Отряд разведчиков, возглавляемый сам{mf|им|ой} Вольным Торговцем, десантировался на замерзший мир. Начальной точкой поисков был определен шаттл, на котором Ульфар Громогласный покинул корабль.

A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.
languages.original_text: Отряд разведчиков, возглавляемый сам{mf|им|ой} Вольным Торговцем, десантировался на замерзший мир. Начальной точкой поисков был определен шаттл, на котором Ульфар Громогласный покинул корабль.

traits.locale_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

languages.text: 行商浪人亲自率领的侦察队降落在了冰封的行星上，找到了乌尔法·雷狼离开飞船时乘坐的穿梭机，开始进行搜索。
languages.original_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人亲自率领的侦察队降落在了冰封的行星上，找到了乌尔法·雷狼离开飞船时乘坐的穿梭机，开始进行搜索。

languages.text: 自由開拓者自らが率いた偵察部隊が氷で覆われた星に落下する。ウルファー・サンダーラングがシップを出発したときに乗っていたシャトルが、捜索のスタート地点となっている。
languages.original_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者自らが率いた偵察部隊が氷で覆われた星に落下する。ウルファー・サンダーラングがシップを出発したときに乗っていたシャトルが、捜索のスタート地点となっている。

languages.text: Un grupo de exploración dirigido por {mf|el propio|la propia} Comerciante Independiente aterriza en el mundo helado. La búsqueda comenzó por la lanzadera con la que Ulfar Pulmón Atronador partió de la nave.
languages.original_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

traits.locale_text: Un grupo de exploración dirigido por {mf|el propio|la propia} Comerciante Independiente aterriza en el mundo helado. La búsqueda comenzó por la lanzadera con la que Ulfar Pulmón Atronador partió de la nave.

languages.text: Une équipe de reconnaissance menée par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne débarque à la surface du monde gelé. La navette utilisée par Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre pour quitter le vaisseau a été choisie comme point de départ des recherches.
languages.original_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

traits.locale_text: Une équipe de reconnaissance menée par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne débarque à la surface du monde gelé. La navette utilisée par Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre pour quitter le vaisseau a été choisie comme point de départ des recherches.

languages.text: Ein Spähtrupp unter der Leitung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} selbst landet auf der eisigen Welt. Das Shuttle, mit dem Ulfar Donnerlunge das Schiff verlassen hat, stellt als Ausgangspunkt der Suche dar.
languages.original_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

traits.locale_text: Ein Spähtrupp unter der Leitung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} selbst landet auf der eisigen Welt. Das Shuttle, mit dem Ulfar Donnerlunge das Schiff verlassen hat, stellt als Ausgangspunkt der Suche dar.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in komutasındaki bir keşif birliği, donuk dünyaya iniş yapıyor. Ulfar Tufanciğer'in gemiyi terk ederken bindiği mekik, aramaya başlanacak nokta olarak belirleniyor.
languages.original_text: A scouting party led by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} makes planetfall on the frozen world. The shuttle on which Ulfar Thunderlung departed the ship has been designated the starting point for the search.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in yönettiği bir keşif birliği, donuk dünyaya iniş yaptı. Ulfar Tufanciğer'in gemiyi terk ederken bindiği mekik, aramanın başlangıç noktası olarak belirlendi.
